abstract: Levi Sanders was raised in unorthodox but loving environment determined by political career and views of his father, Democratic presidential candidate Sen Bernie Sanders; child of relationship in between candidate's two marriages has long accompanied his father on campaign trail and shares many of his views and causes.
lead_paragraph: Levi Sanders, the only biological child of Bernie Sanders, has experienced the parenting of a socialist, anti-establishment politician devoted to fathering and interested in child psychology.

headline.main: In Long Political Career, Sanders Relies on Son as a Constant Witness
headline.print_headline: In Long Political Career, Sanders Relies on Son as a Constant Witness

snippet: Levi Sanders, the only biological child of Bernie Sanders, has experienced the parenting of a socialist, anti-establishment politician devoted to fathering and interested in child psychology.
